analysis.key_quote: Giving one president or one party the unilateral power to fire huge numbers of federal workers, not based on job performance but on political beliefs, is grossly authoritarian and will anger the vast majority of Americans as the polls show this plan is very unpopular.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the dangers of politicizing federal employment and the importance of a merit-based system, highlighting concerns about authoritarianism and the potential for abuse of power.
